Source.Name: xorg-driver-input-wacom
Source.Description: The Xorg Wacom Driver package contains the X.Org X11 driver for Wacom and Wacom-like tablets. It is not required to use a Wacom tablet, the xf86-input-evdev driver can handle these devices without problems.
